title: OPL Finals Fan Art Contest Results

replies.body:
Wow just wow.

so much quality in this thread!
aaaaaaaaaaaaand my self esteem and confidence for my drawing skills have dropped {{champion:32}}

Hello!

I would like to show you this: http://imgur.com/jDpJ12R it is a drawing I did when I first started to learn on the computer :D now I have an entry short listed above! It took a long time but I have improved a lot and I think that everyone can draw if they put practice! If I wasn't so lazy, I'd probably be even better {{champion:223}} {{champion:223}}
you're my lord and saviour
woahh, these shading and style are amazing!! How is this one not in the shortlist.. i feel unfair for ya :(((
Not trying to be rude just offering some constructive criticism, you just need to work on you proportions e.g eyes, neck
is asking for votes allowed???

> [{quoted}](name=Fanarisu,realm=OCE,application-id=hIjvqaz6,discussion-id=I0WTYrWk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-07-27T05:01:52.693+0000)
>
> is asking for votes allowed???

You can ask your friends and friends of friends to vote, but anything beyond that could potentially disqualify your entry (i.e. artificially skewing the vote).
Invade! So awesome haha.
I bet I didn't make it because I spelled Tahm as Tamh.
probs
These are all fantastic, well done to all entrants, looks great!

I cant believe it! This is the first time my art has been recognised! I'm so happy! 

{{champion:119}} {{champion:119}} [I did Noxus Night ride! **DRAVEN IS MY KING**!]{{champion:119}} {{champion:119}}

I have a hard time voting between Long-Fume of Legends Lights and Sunset Carnival
I ended up voting sunset 1 because it reminds me of kingdom hearts (just does) and IT HAS TALON SOMEONE INCLUDED HIM SO HES EPIC{{champion:91}}
Man, I would've voted for the Log-Flume- but maybe I'm just biased.{{champion:112}}
HEY that one is done by my friend. <33

So much variety aye riot..... 
Digital, Digital, Digital, Digital, Digital oh look more digital. 
bit of a let down excluding people who may not have the equipment to make good digital art.
To be honest I don't see why you didn't mix it up a little bit as it would have made the competition interesting. looking at the entries above all I see are the same scenes drawn with the same tools differently next time I would consider adding maybe some watercolour paintings, hand sketched drawings, pencil coloured art and maybe even sculptures. 
In my opinion this isn't an art competition but merely who can use paint the best.

Art is art, bruh- it's about what looks good. If an actual painting was better than anything on the shortlist now, it'd be up there. Most of the people who play League use computers, so that's where they make their art naturally. If you wanna see more traditional stuff, pick up a pencil and do it yourself.

Nobody's excluded- it's a competition. The best entrants win because they're good, not because they're made of pixels.

While I wouldn't complain like you have, I still do agree with what you are saying.
However, I also think what seems appealing is what you can see vividly. It's difficult to show them especially if you have a bad scanner or a terrible camera (to take the photo of your artwork).
When there are such fine colours, you can never see them unless you've done it on the computer (or maybe it's just me with my poor equipments ;_; ). Scanners and cameras don't pick up everything.

Also my guess is that people just automatically thought of this entry as a drawing entry only (and I don't know, maybe it is), so there weren't sculptures entered?

I'm just putting out my thoughts out there.

INVADE


FKING {{champion:432}}
Beast
i got shortlisted and received an email, am i supposed to reply to the email that was sent? did you receive my reply?
Hi Fanarisu, we received your reply. You are allg :)
{{champion:222}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:222}} yay mines in >.< thanks Riot! JINX IS BAE WOO~ {{champion:222}} {{champion:222}} {{champion:222}}
Hmm... can't decide between 'Trust me', 'Lights' and 'Sunset Carnival'. Really awesome artwork in this thread!
Log flumeee
can we make that annie skin happen?
Log Fume Of Lgends, is my type of art style and i love how they all look spot on :)
ikr? I'm just glad they put their url in the corner so we can see more of their stuff. {{champion:112}}

I'm a little disappointed i didn't make it on shortlist i did put a lot of effort in my drawing, maybe it was because people didn't look at my artwork too much, i had a lot of small detail, but the artworks that did make the shortlist I'm fine with everyone, there is very talented people
